body.name: gypsy color The Original 4 Light Crystal White Hardwire Flush Mount Chandelier H17.5”xW15”, White Metal Frame with Clear Glass Stem and Clear Acrylic Crystals & Beads That Sparkle Just Like Glass
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 5 hrs 58 mins
features: ATTENTION FLUSH MOUNT TO CEILING JUNCTION BOX (installation required); transform your favorite spaces; You can use our chandeliers in entry way, dining room, nursery, bedroom, bathroom, closet, hallway, stairwell, game room, porch, girls room and even the garage; Our acrylic crystal chandeliers are elegant, suave and sophisticated, at an affordable price; A delightful mixture of crystals, beading and swag

STRONG & LIGHT WEIGHT highest quality THICK & FACETED polycarbonate crystals; These crystals are the same material used in bullet proof windows and eye lenses, very light and strong; Glass scratches & breaks easily, needs to be assembled one piece at a time, is heavy and costly; Poly-carbonate acrylic will reflect and refract light similar to glass and comes in many different colors

INNOVATIVE DESIGN designed in Austin, our chandelier folds flat for shipping; Our chandelier was designed specifically for shipping right to your door; We figured out how to ship a chandelier flat, almost fully assembled, which cuts down on packaging, weight, damages and waste; When our flat box arives at your door you will know it is a very innovative, smart, environmentally friendly design

EASY TO INSTALL unfold arms, position cups, connect strands and it’s ready All components and installation instructions are included for easy assembly and installation. Uses E12 chandelier bulbs (BULBS NOT INCLUDED). The chain hangs up to 23 inches from the ceiling but can be shortened by removing chain links for perfect height

UL CERTIFIED; ALWAYS AUTHENTICATE UL SAFETY and QUALITY for the highest quality standard & safety rating available in lighting; Your chandelier is designed and supported in Austin, Texas; The supplier offers a 1 Year Warranty against all defects including missing parts or replacement components

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This gorgeous acrylic crystal-beaded Vintage Bohemian Chandelier adds a touch of high design and baroque class to any interior – including bedrooms, bathrooms, etc. Also ideal for weddings, gala events, or outdoor celebrations. A delightful mixture of crystals, beading, and swag, the chandelier is ideal for those who want to make a dramatic statement in any space. This chandelier is made from polycarbonate acrylic crystals and beads, the highest quality acrylic that exists, and has a glass stem with a solid metal frame and arms. Strands of sparkling acrylic beads hang from each light bulb to the glass frame with brilliant acrylic crystals hanging from each light bulb. Designed in the USA, the Brink House chandelier is available in many different colors and sizes. **Attention** Please double-check the SKU title after adding your product to the Buy Box to make sure you are buying your preferred configuration of "Hardwired" or "Plug-in".

STRONG & LIGHTWEIGHT The highest quality thick and faceted acrylic crystals are better than glass! INNOVATIVE DESIGN Designed in Austin, TX, our chandelier folds flat for shipping for less damage and waste! EASY TO INSTALL Unfold the arms, position cups, connect the strands and it's ready! Uses E12 chandelier bulbs (BULBS NOT INCLUDED). MULTIPLE SIZES & COLORS We have a color and size for every room and every occasion. Great lighting for events, tents, kid's rooms, bathrooms, closets, or even a tack room!
***Our photos are from REAL customers — NOT photoshopped***
PERFECT FOR ANY ROOM The hardwire chandelier is perfect for any room or event!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wasn’t expecting this to be as beautiful as it is! It was very simple to hang. It looks great and works great! I would absolutely buy this again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the colors
reviews.reviewText: This light is a conversation piece. The arms of the chandelier do not extend far out so it gives it a more compact look. This light is perfect for a smaller room. The bright red of the frame is gorgeous and the various acrylic crystals .. this is such a fun light.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AMAZING QUALITY PRODUCT LIKE NOTHING ELSE ON AMAZON! I am a fan!!!
reviews.reviewText: I am an electrical contractor, and we hang hundreds of fixtures a year; this is the best fixture ever! Words cannot adequately express how pleased we were with not only the quality of the fixture, but the clever packaging as well. When we received the fixture we thought the box was rather small and assumed there would be endless assembly required, we were fooled! The fixture was folded flat in a cardboard housing and held stable for shipment. This enabled the fixture to come out of the box and simply unfold with zero assembly required! The quality of the fixture surpasses the expectations of this price point. The center stem is glass and adds sparkle to the fixture, the arcrylic "gems" or crystals remind me of a Z Gallerie fixture we purchased (and cost 5 times what this fixtures did!). The chain and cord is about 5' long, more than adequate for most installations. The canopy kit is a standard style with lock ring, which makes for easy installation. Additionally, it comes with all new hardware in case your putting it in a new home. We installed these in a customers bathroom; they had the old style arcrylic plastic lenses with a fluorescent fixture behind them. They were on a budget and did not want to rip the ceilings out; rather than go with the old style and add new arcrylic, we recommended handing a small chandelier and creating a tray type ceiling. As you can see in the photos, both the hall and master bathrooms came out splendid! The price point and the quality combine to make for a fixture that I will definitely recommend time and again; I am excited about using this fixture and hope I can find a place for the multicolor, it seems so festive and lively! I will also put one in my youngest daughters bedroom, stay tuned for that review and pictures! Thank you Gyspy Color for an amazing quality product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Brighter than I expected but not to bright. The colors are lovely, the only down side is find a plug in and blending in the cord.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I haven't written a review in over a year. I don't like being censored, but hopefully this gets posted.Every time I look at this chandelier I smile. It is adorable, and I'm very happy with this purchase! It arrived in great condition due to being well packaged. It was extremely easy to put together. It's small, but big enough for a space that's drab and needs some color. I'm planning to put it in my new chicken coop to give my hens some glitz, and glamour.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased a few 9 light plug in white chandeliers to hang in the tent for my son's wedding. Having an outdoor wedding and we still wanted it to be as elegant as possible and needed a plug in style, since there will be no place to directly wire from the ceiling. To rent from the tent company was the same price per chandelier as to purchase! I assembled the lights to be sure they worked, as well as be sure all the parts were there since the wedding is months away. They were easy to assemble and will for sure give us the elegant look we want and additional lighting at night. Can't wait to see it all come together. We plan on selling them later to another bride & groom with an outdoor venue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like this. Colorful and sassy. Acrylic chandelier is fabulous. So easy to assemble. Sometimes I add extra beads, or silk greenery and flowers. Looks great anywhere, even in a bathroom. My sister hung one in her camper!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice fixture for the money.
reviews.reviewText: Quality piece for the price. You get the expensive look without spending the money. Was exactly what I wanted!

Lo uso meramente decorativo pensé que iba a estar más grande pero para mi lugar queda muy bien, el centro es azul marino y eso no me gustó mucho pero queda bien porque no es contrastante,el material es plástico con metal en las cuentas. Si tienes la altura y un espacio amplio se ve genial!
We love this chandelier. It arrived quickly, in perfect condition. The sellers were quick to reply to any questions we had. I would recommend this company and product to anyone.
I bought a hanging chandelier a couple of years ago from Urban Barn for the same price and there is no comparison.This one is cheap looking and is very small. Good for a childs room or a closet.
